World Cup (Soccer)

lead_paragraph: The world’s biggest sporting contests, like the soccer World Cup and the Olympics, are moving away from traditional sites like London and in the direction of emerging powers and economies.
snippet: The world’s biggest sporting contests, like the soccer World Cup and the Olympics, are moving away from traditional sites like London and in the direction of emerging powers and economies.
